attributes.title: Couldn’t download it!
attributes.review: I was trying to download this app to support MY president, Donald J. Trump. (The J stands for Jenius) But it was stuck on 13 and 12. Not sure why. Well, anyway, back the blue bc 40% of their salary goes to coronavirus relief. Look up “police 40 percent” for more information on our wonderful officers. Seriously. Look it up. Look up police 40 percent.

attributes.title: Waste of space
attributes.review: You’re first greeted with his crinkled up ball face. The worst thing you’ll see, EVER. 🤢🤮I don’t understand how anyone could find that face as the face of America. Aside from this, his app took 3.5 days for it to download. Believe me, I have fast WiFi. Don’t download this app. Don’t waste you time. Download TikTok instead

attributes.title: This app upsets my car
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it asked me if I was white. I said no and the word white supremacy popped up. It told me how being anything other than white was a crime. Then it asked me if I was a woman and I clicked yes. The app told me that we as diverse females could not have the app. Then everything was wiped from my phone.

attributes.title: Tiktok the only good thing we have left
attributes.review: You want to take away the only thing keeping us together. You want to take away something we need. I might sound obsessed but common bruh, it's BILLIONS of us vs you the odds are in our favor. Gen Z will NOT lose the one thing that can keep us happy and smiling. So hold this L for me

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: All I wanted to do was use this app to get news about our lord and savior chunky cheese puff, however when I tried to download it it took 97 hours, after it finally downloaded and I opened it my phone exploded! I can’t believe this is an outrage and I would like to speak to your manager!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!
attributes.review: Immediately after downloading this app, my phone started to overheat! I kept getting pop ups asking for personal information, and other applications on my phone started closing randomly. So many bugs- Not Good!! One of the worst and most boring apps on the appstore. A totally overrated app. 🧚🏻✨

attributes.title: One of the worst apps in the App Store
attributes.review: I got scared to death I opened up the app and a big fat cheeto puff showed up and a fell out my chair I’m still in shock tbh it almost killed me this app can be here because it could be very harmful to ppl who get scared easily if I could give it 0 I would so here it is delete the app from the App Store

attributes.title: This app killed me!
attributes.review: I was on my death bed and turned to my lord and savior donald trump for the breath of life I so needed. I downloaded this app in hopes of saving my own life... Sadly, after 4 days of waiting for it to download, all that pops up when I click the app is a blank screen saying death is upon you. So here I am. Dead.

attributes.title: Cancel Trump
attributes.review:
1 star is very generous considering how TRASH this app is. Dump the Trump app in the bin and erase it from my memory cause this app gave me seizures and brought bad juju upon my entire family
I swear the only person that can probably save me is Mulan but she she big dead now so that means I’m not going to be living like Larry anymore
Thanks a lot Trump

attributes.title: So disappointed 🤢🤢🤢🤮
attributes.review: This app took 8 weeks to download and then when I was able to go on there it was glitching like crazy, I don’t mean to be rude but this app is TRASH!!🤮 It doesn’t take that long for an app to download. I’m never looking,downloading,hearing from this again, this is ridiculous.
